common.payline_presto_waiting: Your order is recorded, with an agreement in principle of your request for financing. The order will be processed after final acceptance by the credit organisation. You will be informed by email of the evolution of your file.
common.payline_no_response: The response from the credit agency was not received in time. It may be sent at a later date or after the payment has been checked. The order is registered, our customer service is informed of the situation and will contact you for confirmation.

footer.mention_brand_chronocarpe3: are sole property of SAS Chronoloisirs
footer.mention_delivery2: For metropolitan France from 89€ purchase by Colissimo and 199 € for all others.
footer.mention_express2: Metropolitan France, for eligible items - 24h excluding weekends and holidays
footer.mention_shipping2: Processing your order within 24h except weekends and holidays subject to payment validity
footer.mention_x3x4payment2: available for French accounts subject to acceptance by the lending institution (Cofidis - Cetelem)
footer.website1: Chronocarp is an online e-commerce website of the company Chrono Loisirs. You will find the largest selection of carp fishing articles and the most prestigious brands.
footer.website2: Since 2005, faced with growing carp anglers expectations and to offer you the most complete materials for your sessions, we have selected the hottest products on the market. You can then choose from the rods, reels, detectors, rod pod, bivvies, boats and baitboats, luggage and clothing or terminals and tools.
footer.website3: The range of products of carp fishing brands are in stock and shipped within 24 hours. You will find Chronocarp products for carp anglers at discount prices.

jobinternship.jobinternship_intro: As a part of its development Chronocarp recruits

email.subject: Subject
email.offer_gift_card: offers you a gift card Chronocarpe
email.use_with_code: to use the site with code www.chronocarpe.com
email.add_our_contact: To that emails arrive well in your inbox, thank you contact@chronocarpe.com to add to your address book.

email.help_sav_part2: or by phone from Monday to Friday from 14h to 18h +33 5 61 64 40 33
email.baseline_chronocarpe: Since 2005 Chronocarpe offers many benefits for your purchases with confidence.
email.conditions_order: You have 14 days to change your mind and request a refund, the shipping costs are free from 89 € of purchase, items AVAILABLE are shipped within 24 hours, you can pay in 4 times without expenses from 100 € more than 95% of items are available, payment security is provided by the banking institutions with the option 3Dsecure ... and more.
email.conditions_giftcard: The conditions of validity and use of codes "Gift Card" Chronocarpe are defined in the General Conditions section and on the sheet visible gift card on the site www.chronocarpe.com Preview: The Gift card is Chronocarpe intended purchases on the site www.chronocarpe.com, non-refundable, non-exchangeable, non-split. The computer code is only valid for determining the validity or otherwise of a gift card.
email.info_chronocarpe: Faced with the growing expectations of carp fishers and in order to offer you the most complete range of products, we have selected the most popular equipment on the market. You will be able to choose from the most prestigious brands such as Fox, Nash, Delkim, Carpdesign, Prowess, JRC, Starbaits, Anatec, CarpSpirit, Korda, Prologic, Mad ... and many others. You will find on the ChronoCarp site the best products for carp fishing! Our advisors are at your service to help you either by phone, email or on social networks.
